name: Stupit/OS
description: The game involes a operating system was released in 2015, it was released in 2017 in the itch.io website after the Stupit/OS movie came out on Vimeo, you can go on Fun Computer, The Internet and E-Mail, if click the Trash and click on Yes, your Dollarcard will get terminated and close the operating system, how stupid is that? anyways, this is the worst operating system and i made it.
